content.text: Where the cable comes ashore it shall be:
a) secured mechanically to a fixed point using the strength member of the cable;
b) be protected mechanically in the tidal zone and to a depth of 3 m (ffs) below the lowest tide level;
c) marked to prevent anchoring of vessels etc. in the tidal zone and to a depth of 3 m (ffs) below the lowest  tide level.
Cables with metallic cable elements shall be provided with overvoltage protection.

requirements.text: Where the cable comes ashore it shall be:
Cables with metallic cable elements shall be provided with overvoltage protection.
